name: Memorize (itch)
description:
A short prototype, built with a dream, investigating how a memory might lodge itself within you. Which details are real? Which did you lose? How long can you spend working through it?

Retrospective on current prototype:

The end visuals have come out more or less exactly as I wanted them to, but the transitions when data appears or leaves the screen is clunkier than I had intended. There is some merit to the current system, as it can throw your concentration, which mimics the overall metaphor, probably more effectively, than the softer transitions I was aiming for. 

Likely to work on this idea again in the future, but not this specific iteration.
